amenities.interior: Very original--built-ins, leaded glass, updated kitchen
amenities.site: Corner lot, close to transportation, shopping, freeways

house_listing.comments: 2 for the price of one! Pristine english w/hardwood floors, natural woodwork, built-ins,leaded glass windows. Price also includes 1 bedroom/1bath cottageon same tax lot. Cottage built in 1931, has approx 526 sq.Ft.

for_more_information_contact.firm_name: Windermere Cronin & Caplan Realty Group, Inc.
